magnify.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make something seem bigger or louder, especially using special equipment
magnify.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: At the Sheffield arena, the speakers were magnified ten times on a giant screen.

magnify.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to make something seem more important than it really is
